introduction.title: Your new best friend.
introduction.text: An open-source contextual chatbot built with an artificial neural network.

speakAbility.title: Ability to speak
speakAbility.text:
Olivia can listen to you by saying “Hey Olivia” or clicking on the central button.
She speak to reply you, unless you've disabled her voice.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.text:
Olivia respects your privacy. All the data used by Olivia is saved in your client
You own your data, simply as that.

modulable.title: Completely modulable
modulable.text: Olivia is organized in modules to facilitate the addition of new capabilities. These modules can be written in Go to execute multiple tasks.

openSource.title: Fully open-source
openSource.text: The project is entirely open-source from the website to the backend. Thus you can build your own chatbot and contribute to Olivia.

pwa.title: Progressive web app
pwa.text: You can directly add the PWA to your homescreen from the website, and you won't remember that it is a website running behind this native-like app.

chat.welcome: Hey, I'm Olivia. You can talk with me by writing in the field below, saying the hotword “Hey Olivia” or clicking the main circle and speak.
chat.defaultMessage: What can I do for you?

data.errorLossText: Error loss of the neural network

creator.studies: ● Student at Lycée Madame de Staël. Earth and life sciences option, specialization in computer science.
creator.olivia: ● Creator and maintainer of Olivia, 1.5K stars-projet on GitHub
creator.skills: ● Skills: programming languages: Go, JS, Ruby, Crystal, Python, technologies: Ruby on Rails, Vue.js, LaTeX, Docker, Git
